title: _C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: undefined symbol: _ZN3MPI8Datatype4FreeEv libgcc_s.so.1 must be installed for pthread_cancel to work
body_html:
import torch in python3.5 report error:

~/.virtualenvs/dl4cv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/init.py in ()
51 sys.setdlopenflags(_dl_flags.RTLD_GLOBAL | _dl_flags.RTLD_NOW)
52
---> 53 from torch._C import *
54
55 all += [name for name in dir(_C)

ImportError: /home/master/.virtualenvs/dl4cv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: undefined symbol: _ZN3MPI8Datatype4FreeEv
libgcc_s.so.1 must be installed for pthread_cancel to work
Aborted (core dumped)

i see similar error have work round for conda installing, but no solution for source installing.

tks.

Environments:

  • PyTorch Version: 0.20
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS
  • install from source
  • install command: python setup.py install
  • Python version: 3.5.2
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 8.0.61
  • GPU models and configuration: 6.0.21

body:
import torch in python3.5 report error:

~/.virtualenvs/dl4cv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/__init__.py in <module>()
     51 sys.setdlopenflags(_dl_flags.RTLD_GLOBAL | _dl_flags.RTLD_NOW)
     52 
---> 53 from torch._C import *
     54 
     55 __all__ += [name for name in dir(_C)

ImportError: /home/master/.virtualenvs/dl4cv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: undefined symbol: _ZN3MPI8Datatype4FreeEv
libgcc_s.so.1 must be installed for pthread_cancel to work
Aborted (core dumped)

i see similar error have work round for conda installing, but no solution for source installing.

tks.

Environments:
 - PyTorch Version: 0.20
 - OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS
 - install from source
 - install command: python setup.py install
 - Python version: 3.5.2
 - CUDA/cuDNN version: 8.0.61
 - GPU models and configuration: 6.0.21
